_comment: This is a placeholder google-services.json file.
_instructions: To enable Firebase authentication, you need to:
2. Create a new project or select an existing one
3. Add an Android app with package name: com.example.habits
5. Replace this file with your downloaded google-services.json
6. For Google Sign-In: Enable it in Firebase Console > Authentication > Sign-in method
7. Add SHA-1 certificate fingerprint in Firebase Console > Project Settings > Your apps
8. For Apple Sign-In: Enable it in Firebase Console > Authentication > Sign-in method
